attributes.contentHtml:
MysteriousK69 STOP BEING A FUCKING RETARD. KID, LISTEN CAREFULLY. UNLESS YOU GIVE ME PROOF OF ME DELETING THE FUCKING MYSQL SHIT, NO ONE GIVES A FUCK. STOP BEING A RETARDED. ALSO, YES I DID ASK FOR MONEY TO REINSTALL IT. BUT, I BY NO MEANS FUCKED IT UP. I NEVER TOUCHED HIS VPS EITHER.

MysteriousK69 Sorry for the caps, I just got really pissed off.
